Scripts.OnEnter:
local iconID = 3 if (GR_TT_assignmentName[iconID] ~= "none") and (GR_TT_iconStatus[iconID] == "false") then local tt = getglobal("GameTooltip") tt:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_CURSOR") temp_string = "[|cFF00FF00"..GR_TT_assignmentName[iconID].."|cFFFFFFFF]|r is still assigned to this icon\n|cFFc0c0FFRightclick|r to clear" tt:SetText(temp_string) end
local iconNum = 3
if GR_TT_targetWho[iconNum][1] ~= "none" then local temp_string = "|cFFc0c0FFTargetters: |r\n" for key, value in GR_TT_targetWho[iconNum] do temp_string = temp_string..value.."\n" end
local tt = getglobal("GameTooltip"); tt:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_CURSOR"); tt:SetText(temp_string); end

Scripts.OnEnter:
local tt = getglobal("GameTooltip") tt:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_CURSOR") local status = GR_TT_GetMode() local temp_text if status then temp_text = "Current Mode: Raid Member
|cFFc0c0FFClick:|r switch to |cFF00FF00Leader|r mode" else temp_text = "Current Mode: Leader
|cFFc0c0FFClick:|r switch to |cFF00FF00Raid Member|r mode" end
if not (IsRaidLeader() or IsRaidOfficer() or IsPartyLeader()) then temp_text = temp_text.."
|cFFFF0000You are not a Raid Leader, Assist, or Party Leader" end tt:SetText(temp_text) GR_TT_menuFadeStatus = true
Scripts.OnLeave: local tt = getglobal("GameTooltip") tt:Hide() GR_TT_menuFadeStatus = false
Scripts.OnClick:
GR_TT_ToggleMode()
local tt = getglobal("GameTooltip") tt:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_CURSOR") local status = GR_TT_GetMode() if status then temp_text = "Current Mode: Raid Member
|cFFc0c0FFClick:|r switch to |cFF00FF00Leader|r mode" else temp_text = "Current Mode: Leader
|cFFc0c0FFClick:|r switch to |cFF00FF00Raid Member|r mode" end
if not (IsRaidLeader() or IsRaidOfficer() or IsPartyLeader()) then temp_text = temp_text.."
|cFFFF0000You are not a Raid Leader, Assist, or Party Leader" end tt:SetText(temp_text)

Scripts.OnShow:
this:ClearAllPoints() this:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", "GRTT_statusPanel", "TOPRIGHT", GR_TT_buttonToMain_x+1-13-13-1-13-1-13-1, GR_TT_buttonToMain_y)
local current_mode = GR_TT_GetMode() if current_mode then GR_TT_HideComponent(this) end

Scripts.OnShow: this:ClearAllPoints() this:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", "GRTT_statusPanel", "TOPRIGHT", GR_TT_buttonToMain_x+1-13-13-1-13-1, GR_TT_buttonToMain_y) if not GR_TT_getLockInCombat() then this:SetNormalTexture(GR_TT_lockInCombatIconDisabled) this:SetPushedTexture(GR_TT_lockInCombatIconDisabled) else this:SetNormalTexture(GR_TT_lockInCombatIconEnabled) this:SetPushedTexture(GR_TT_lockInCombatIconEnabled) end local current_mode = GR_TT_GetMode() if current_mode then GR_TT_HideComponent(this) end
Scripts.OnEnter: local tt = getglobal("GameTooltip") tt:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_CURSOR") local status = GR_TT_getLockInCombat() if status then tt:SetText("Icons in combat are |cFFFF0000locked|r.\n|cFFc0c0FFClick|r to |cFF00FF00unlock|r.") else tt:SetText("Icons in combat are |cFF00FF00unlocked|r.\n|cFFc0c0FFClick|r to |cFFFF0000lock|r.") end GR_TT_menuFadeStatus = true
Scripts.OnLeave: local tt = getglobal("GameTooltip") tt:Hide() GR_TT_menuFadeStatus = false
Scripts.OnMouseDown: GR_TT_HandleMouseClick(27, arg1) local tt = getglobal("GameTooltip") tt:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_CURSOR") local status = GR_TT_getLockInCombat() if status then tt:SetText("Icons in combat are |cFFFF0000locked|r.\n|cFFc0c0FFClick|r to |cFF00FF00unlock|r.") else tt:SetText("Icons in combat are |cFF00FF00unlocked|r.\n|cFFc0c0FFClick|r to |cFFFF0000lock|r.") end

Scripts.OnShow: this:ClearAllPoints() this:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", "GRTT_statusPanel", "TOPRIGHT", GR_TT_buttonToMain_x+1-13, GR_TT_buttonToMain_y) if not GR_TT_getTargetPaintMode() then this:SetNormalTexture(GR_TT_targetPaintModeIconDisabled) this:SetPushedTexture(GR_TT_targetPaintModeIconDisabled) else this:SetNormalTexture(GR_TT_targetPaintModeIconEnabled) this:SetPushedTexture(GR_TT_targetPaintModeIconEnabled) end
Scripts.OnEnter:
local tt = getglobal("GameTooltip") tt:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_CURSOR") local status = GR_TT_getTargetPaintMode() if not status then tt:SetText("|cFFc0c0FFSimple Mode|r allows managing targets without expanding the Icon panel.
|cFFc0c0FFSimple Mode|r is |cFFFF0000disabled|r.

|cFFc0c0FFClick|r to |cFF00FF00enable|r.") else tt:SetText("|cFFc0c0FFSimple Mode|r allows managing targets without expanding the Icon panel.
|cFFc0c0FFSimple Mode|r is |cFF00FF00enabled|r.

|cFFc0c0FFClick|r to |cFFFF0000disable|r.") end GR_TT_menuFadeStatus = true
Scripts.OnLeave: local tt = getglobal("GameTooltip") tt:Hide() GR_TT_menuFadeStatus = false

|cFFc0c0FFSimple Mode|r is |cFFFF0000disabled|r.

|cFFc0c0FFClick|r to |cFF00FF00enable|r.") else tt:SetText("|cFFc0c0FFSimple Mode|r allows managing targets without expanding the Icon panel.
|cFFc0c0FFSimple Mode|r is |cFF00FF00enabled|r.

|cFFc0c0FFClick|r to |cFFFF0000disable|r.") end GR_TT_menuFadeStatus = true

Scripts.OnLoad: if GR_TT_getFadeMenu then statusShow = false else statusShow = true end
Scripts.OnEnter: GR_TT_menuFadeStatus = true
Scripts.OnMouseDown: local status = GR_TT_isLocked() local main_frame_pointer = getglobal("GRTT_Main") if GR_TT_layout == 4 and IsShiftKeyDown() and not status then this:StartMoving() elseif ((not status) and (arg1 == "LeftButton")) then main_frame_pointer:StartMoving() main_frame_pointer.isMoving = true end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: local main_frame_pointer = getglobal("GRTT_Main") if (main_frame_pointer.isMoving) then main_frame_pointer:StopMovingOrSizing() main_frame_pointer.isMoving = false end this:StopMovingOrSizing()

Scripts.OnEnter:
local iconID = 4 if (GR_TT_assignmentName[iconID] ~= "none") and (GR_TT_iconStatus[iconID] == "false") then local tt = getglobal("GameTooltip") tt:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_CURSOR") temp_string = "[|cFF00FF00"..GR_TT_assignmentName[iconID].."|cFFFFFFFF]|r is still assigned to this icon\n|cFFc0c0FFRightclick|r to clear" tt:SetText(temp_string) end

Scripts.OnShow: if not GR_TT_getDisplayIconHP() then for index = 1,8 do GR_TT_HideComponent(getglobal("GRTT_"..GR_TT_iconList[index].."HPPanel")) end end

Scripts.OnEnter: local iconID = 6 if GR_TT_targetName[iconID] ~= "none" or GR_TT_assignmentName[iconID] ~= "none" then local tt = getglobal("GameTooltip") tt:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_CURSOR") local temp_string = "" if GR_TT_targetName[iconID] ~= "none" then temp_string = "|cFFFFFFFF[|cFFFFc0c0"..GR_TT_targetName[iconID].."|cFFFFFFFF]"; else temp_string = "|cFFFFFFFF[|cFFFFc0c0no target|cFFFFFFFF]|r" end if GR_TT_assignmentName[iconID] ~= "none" then temp_string = temp_string.." -> |cFFFFFFFF[|cFF00FF00"..GR_TT_assignmentName[iconID].."|cFFFFFFFF]" end tt:SetText(temp_string) end

Scripts.OnMouseDown: GR_TT_HandleMouseClick(6, arg1) if GR_TT_layout == 4 and IsShiftKeyDown() and not GR_TT_LockedStatus then getglobal("GRTT_squarePanel"):StartMoving() end
if GR_TT_layout == 4 and IsShiftKeyDown() and not GR_TT_LockedStatus then this:StartMoving() end

Scripts.OnEnter:
local iconID = 7 if (GR_TT_assignmentName[iconID] ~= "none") and (GR_TT_iconStatus[iconID] == "false") then local tt = getglobal("GameTooltip") tt:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_CURSOR") temp_string = "[|cFF00FF00"..GR_TT_assignmentName[iconID].."|cFFFFFFFF]|r is still assigned to this icon
|cFFc0c0FFRightclick|r to clear" tt:SetText(temp_string) end local iconNum = 7
if GR_TT_targetWho[iconNum][1] ~= "none" then local temp_string = "|cFFc0c0FFTargetters: |r
" for key, value in GR_TT_targetWho[iconNum] do temp_string = temp_string..value.."
" end
local tt = getglobal("GameTooltip"); tt:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_CURSOR"); tt:SetText(temp_string); end
Scripts.OnMouseDown: GR_TT_HandleMouseClick(7, arg1) if GR_TT_layout == 4 and IsShiftKeyDown() and not GR_TT_LockedStatus then getglobal("GRTT_xPanel"):StartMoving() end

Scripts.OnShow: local current_mode = GR_TT_GetMode() if (current_mode) or (not current_mode and not GR_TT_iconStatus[7]) then GR_TT_HardwareHide(this) end
